articles.description: These will be concepts for the brand’s future dedicated EVs    Five electric SUVs will be showcased by Mahindra at its ‘Born Electric Vision’ event on August 15 in the UK.    New teaser showcases five different sized and differently styled SUVs, most of them …
articles.content:
• Five electric SUVs will be showcased by Mahindra at its Born Electric Vision event on August 15 in the UK.
